name: Seperation
description:
This game was created for GGJ-22 in İzmir OYGEM. GAME DEVELOPERS

BURAKHAN ALTAY
MERT BALKAN

  GAME ARTISTS 

SABAHAT SARIOGLU
OSMAN TOMASO
IREM ERDAL
MUHITTIN BAYKAL

  KEYBOARD CONTROLLERS

Sheep Controllers
WASD  -> movement
Space -> jump
T -> slow Time
E -> eat Grass

Wolf Character Controllers

WASD -> movement
Space -> jump
E -> dash

Generally
Q -> Character Changing
